altText.mappingExample1: Diagram drawn on flip chart paper with blue labels for different actors (Churches, Developers, Residents, Real estate agents, City, Banks, State, CBOs and Businesses). altText.mappingExample2: Diagram drawn on flip chart paper with separate lists of actors (GreenRoots, City Hall, schools, investors, etc.), relationships (elections, laws, city development), and forms of power (economic power, organizing power, political power, etc.).
